00018 const GLenum cubeFaceMap[] = 
00019 {
00020         GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_X,
00021         GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_X,
00022         GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_POSITIVE_Y,
00023         GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP_NEGATIVE_Y,

00038 GrTextureCube::GrTextureCube( const UPath& name, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, unsigned int width, unsigned int flags )
00039 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, format, flags, ETT_CUBE )
00040 , _width( width )
00041 , _fromFile( false )
00042 , _ownImages( false )
00043 {
00044         MemSet( _images, 0, sizeof( _images ) );
00045         Create();
00046 }
00047 
00048 //----------------------------------------------------------
00049 GrTextureCube::GrTextureCube( const UPath& name, const UPath** images, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, unsigned int flags,
00050                                                           bool cacheImages )
00051 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, format, flags, ETT_CUBE )
00052 , _width( 0 )
00053 , _fromFile( true )
00054 , _ownImages( cacheImages )
00055 {
00057         B_ASSERT( images );
00058         B_ASSERT( images[ 0 ] != 0 );
00059 
00061         for ( unsigned int face = 0; face < 6; ++face )
00062                 _rsrcPaths[ face ] = *images[ face ];
00063 
00065         if ( cacheImages )
00066         {
00067                 for ( unsigned int face = 0; face < 6; ++face )
00068                         _images[ face ] = LoadImg( _rsrcPaths[ face ] );
00069         }
00070 
00071         Create();
00072 }
00073 
00074 //----------------------------------------------------------
00075 GrTextureCube::GrTextureCube( const UPath& name, GrImage** images, GrTextureBase::EFORMAT format, unsigned int flags )
00076 : GrTextureBase( name, GL_TEXTURE_CUBE_MAP, format, flags, ETT_CUBE )
00077 , _width( 0 )
00078 , _fromFile( false )
00079 , _ownImages( true )
00080 {
00082         B_ASSERT( images );
00083         B_ASSERT( images[ 0 ] != 0 );
00084         B_ASSERT( IsValidImageSet( images ) );
00085 
00087         _width = images[ 0 ]->GetWidth();
00088 
00090         for ( unsigned int face = 0; face < 6; ++face )
00091                 _images[ face ] = images[ face ];
00092 
00093         Create();
00094 }
00095 
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------
00097 GrTextureCube::~GrTextureCube()
00098 {
00099         CHECK_GL();
00100         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00101                 delete _images[ i ];
00102 }

00109 //----------------------------------------------------------
00110 bool
00111 GrTextureCube::IsValidImageSet( GrImage** images )
00112 {
00113         B_ASSERT( images );
00114         B_ASSERT( images[ 0 ] != 0 );
00115 
00117         unsigned int width = images[ 0 ]->GetWidth();
00118         bool hasMipMaps = images[ 0 ]->HasMipMaps();
00119         GrImage::EFORMAT format = images[ 0 ]->GetFormat();
00120 
00122         for ( unsigned int face = 1; face < 6; ++face )
00123         {
00124                 if ( width != images[ face ]->GetWidth() )
00125                         return false;
00126                 if ( images[ face ]->GetWidth() != images[ face ]->GetHeight() )
00127                         return false;
00128                 if ( format != images[ face ]->GetFormat() )
00129                         return false;
00130                 if ( images[ face ]->HasMipMaps() != hasMipMaps )
00131                         return false;
00132         }
00133 
00135         return true;
00136 }

00138 //----------------------------------------------------------
00139 void
00140 GrTextureCube::BindToFramebuffer( unsigned int attachment, ECUBEFACE cubeFace )
00141 {
00143         B_ASSERT( attachment == GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT );
00144 
00146         bglFramebufferTexture2DEXT( GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, attachment, cubeFaceMap[ cubeFace ], GetTexHandle(), 0 );
00147         CHECK_GL();
00148 }

00155 //----------------------------------------------------------
00156 void
00157 GrTextureCube::UploadImage( bool mipmap )
00158 {
00160         CHECK_GL();
00161 
00163         B_ASSERT( GetTexHandle() != 0 );
00164 
00165         for ( unsigned int face = 0; face < 6; ++face )
00166         {
00167 
00169                 GrImage* image = 0;
00170                 if ( _ownImages )
00171                 {
00172                         image = _images[ face ];
00173                 }
00174                 else if ( _fromFile )
00175                 {
00176                         image = LoadImg( _rsrcPaths[ face ] );
00177                 }
00178 
00180                 unsigned int internalFormat = GetGLFormat( image );
00181 
00183                 if ( image != 0 )
00184                 {
00186                         if ( !IsPow2( _width ) )
00187                         {
00188                                 B_ERROR( "Unsupported texture image: dimensions must be a power of 2." );
00189                         }
00190 
00193                         bool isNormalMap = false;
00194                         EFORMAT format = GetFormat();
00195                         if ( format == EF_A8 || format == EF_L8 )
00196                                 image->ConvertToI8();
00197                         else if ( format == EF_LA16 )
00198                         {
00199                                 if ( image->GetFormat() == GrImage::EF_BGRA32 )
00200                                         image->ConvertToLA16();
00201                                 else if ( image->GetFormat() == GrImage::EF_BGR24 )
00202                                         image->ConvertToI8();
00203                         }
00204                         else if ( format == EF_NORMALMAP || format == EF_HIGHDEFNORMALMAP )
00205                                 isNormalMap = true;
00206 
00208                         unsigned int baseMipLevel = 0;
00209                         if ( mipmap )
00210                         {
00213                                 if ( !image->HasMipMaps() )
00214                                 {
00216                                         image->GenMipMaps( isNormalMap );
00217                                 }
00218                         }
00219 
00221                         if ( isNormalMap )
00222                                 image->SwizzleToBXRG();
00223 
00225                         image->TexImage2D( cubeFaceMap[ face ], internalFormat, baseMipLevel, mipmap ? 0 : 1, isNormalMap );
00226                 }
00227                 else
00228                 {
00229                         if ( mipmap )
00230                         {
00231                                 unsigned int mipLevel = 0;
00232                                 unsigned int mipDim = _width;
00233                                 while ( mipDim != 1 )
00234                                 {
00235                                         bglTexImage2D( cubeFaceMap[ face ], mipLevel, internalFormat, mipDim, mipDim, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0 );
00236                                         mipDim >>= 1;
00237                                         ++mipLevel;
00238                                 }
00239                         }
00240                         else
00241                         {
00242                                 bglTexImage2D( cubeFaceMap[ face ], 0, internalFormat, _width, _width, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, 0 );
00243                         }
00244                 }
00245                 CHECK_GL();
00246         }
00247 }

00250 GrImage*
00251 GrTextureCube::LoadImg( const UPath& fileName )
00252 {
00253         return CreateImage( fileName );
00254 }
